email.incomingsupport.body1.text: Kua tukuna e tētahi kiritaki te mōhiohio e whai ake nei

email.secret_link.subject.text: I tukua e %{sender_email} tētahi karere huna ki a koe

email.secret_link.sent_you_secret.text: i tuku i tētahi karere huna ki a koe:

email.secret_link.link_works_once.text: Ka mahi tēnei hononga kotahi wā anake. I muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna.

email.welcome.title.text: Kua pōwhiritia koe ki te hono ki %{product_name}!

email.welcome.verify_prompt.text: Tēnā manatokohia tō wāhitau īmēra mā te pāwhiri i te hononga i raro:

email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.text: Tārua, whakapiri rānei i tēnei hononga:

email.welcome.postscript.text: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}. Mēnā kāore koe i te tūmanako i tēnei pōwhiri, ka taea e koe te karo haumaru i tēnei karere.

email.password_request.request_notice.text: I whiwhi mātou i tētahi tono kia tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa mō %{product_name}.

email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.text: Tārua, whakapiri rānei i tēnei hononga:

email.password_request.ignore_notice.text: Mēnā kāore koe i tono i te tautuhi anō kupuhipa, ka taea e koe te karo haumaru i tēnei īmēra.

email.password_request.postscript.text: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}.

email.magic_link.request_notice.text: I tono koe i tētahi hononga takiuru mō tō pūkete %{product_name}.

email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.text: Tāruatia rānei ka whakapiri i tēnei hononga:

email.magic_link.expiration_notice.text: Ka pau tēnei hononga i roto i te 15 meneti.

email.magic_link.ignore_notice.text: Mēnā kāore koe i tono i tēnei hononga, ka taea e koe te karo i tēnei īmēra.

email.magic_link.postscript.text: Tāpiritanga: I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{email_address}.

email.incoming_secret.subject.text: Kua whiwhi koe i tētahi karere huna

email.incoming_secret.received_message.text: Kua whiwhi koe i tētahi karere haumaru:

email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.text: Kua tukuna e tētahi tētahi karere haumaru ki a koe mā %{display_domain}.

email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.text: Hei tiro i tēnei karere huna, pāwhiri i te hononga i raro:

email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.text: Ka mahi tēnei hononga kotahi wā anake. I muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna.

email.secret_revealed.viewed_on.text: I tirohia tō karere huna i %{date}.

email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.text: He pānui aunoa tēnei. Kāore he mahi e hiahiatia ana.

email.secret_revealed.manage_preferences.text: Hei whakahaere i ō hiahia pānui:

email.expiration_warning.subject.text: Ka pau wawe tō hononga karere huna

email.expiration_warning.expires_in.text: Ka pau tō hononga karere huna i roto i %{time_remaining}

email.expiration_warning.view_button.text: Tirohia tō karere huna kia kore anō i pau

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.text: I muri i te pauhanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna, ā, kāore e taea te whakaora.

email.expiration_warning.view_before_gon.text: Tirohia kia kore anō i ngaro:

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.text: I muri i te pauhanga, ka mukua tonutia te karere huna.

email.organization_invitation.subject.text: Kua pōwhiritia koe ki te hono ki %{organization_name}

email.organization_invitation.title.text: Kua pōwhiritia koe ki te hono ki %{organization_name}!

email.organization_invitation.body.text: Kua pōwhiri a %{inviter_email} i a koe ki te hono ki "%{organization_name}" hei %{role_description}.

email.organization_invitation.link_instr.text: Tārua rānei me te whakapiri i tēnei hononga:

email.organization_invitation.expiry_not.text: Ka pau tēnei pōwhiri i roto i te %{days} rā.

email.organization_invitation.decline_in.text: Mēnā kāore koe e hiahia ki te hono, ka taea e koe te karo noa i tēnei īmēra, te whakakāhore rānei i te pōwhiri.

email.organization_invitation.postscript.text: P.S. I tukuna tēnei īmēra ki %{invited_email}. Mēnā kāore koe i te tūmanako i tēnei pōwhiri, ka taea e koe te karo haumaru i tēnei karere.

email.password_changed.body.text: I hurihia tō kupuhipa mō %{product_name} i %{date} i %{time}.

email.password_changed.security_notice.text: Mēnā kāore koe i hanga i tēnei panoni, tēnā whakaū i tō pūkete ināianei mā te tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa me te whakapā atu ki te tautoko.

email.email_changed.body.text: I hurihia te wāhitau īmēra mō tō pūkete %{product_name} ki %{new_email_masked} i %{date}.

email.email_changed.security_notice.text: Mēnā kāore koe i hanga i tēnei panoni, tēnā whakapā atu ki te tautoko ināianei, kei kino tō pūkete.

email.email_change_confirmation.body.text: Tēnā manatokohia tēnei wāhitau īmēra kia oti te panoni mō tō pūkete %{product_name}.

email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.text: Tārua, whakapiri rānei i tēnei hononga:

email.mfa_enabled.body.text: I whakahohehia te manatoko rua-āhuatanga mō tō pūkete %{product_name} i %{date}.

email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.text: Kei te haumaru ake tō pūkete. Me whakauru e koe tētahi waehere manatoko mai i tō taupānga manatoko i te takiuru.

email.mfa_disabled.body.text: I whakakāhoretia te manatoko rua-āhuatanga mō tō pūkete %{product_name} i %{date}.

email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.text: Kei te iti ake te haumaru o tō pūkete. Mēnā kāore koe i hanga i tēnei panoni, tēnā whakaū i tō pūkete ināianei.

email.new_login_alert.body.text: I kitea tētahi takiuru hou ki tō pūkete %{product_name} i %{date} i %{time}.

email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.text: Mēnā kāore tēnei koe, kei kino pea tō pūkete.

email.member_removed.body.text: Kua tangohia koe i te whakahaere "%{organization_name}" i %{product_name}.

email.role_changed.body.text: Kua hurihia tō tūranga i "%{organization_name}" mai i %{old_role} ki %{new_role}.

email.organization_deleted.body.text: Kua mukua te whakahaere "%{organization_name}" i %{product_name}. Kua tangohia ngā raraunga katoa e pā ana.

email.payment_receipt.body.text: Ngā mihi mō tō utu. Kei konei ō taipitopito utu:

email.payment_failed.body.text: Kāore mātou i taea te tukatuka i tō utu mō %{product_name}. Tēnā whakahou i tō tikanga utu kia kore ai te whakamutuhanga ratonga.

email.trial_expiring.subject.text: Ka pau tō whakamātautau %{product_name} i roto i %{days_remaining} rā

email.trial_expiring.title.text: Kei Te Mutu Wawe Tō Whakamātautau

email.trial_expiring.body.text: Ka pau tō whakamātautau koreutu o %{product_name} i roto i %{days_remaining} rā. Whakapai ake ināianei kia puritia te urunga ki ngā āhuatanga katoa.

email.subscription_changed.body.text: Kua hurihia tō ohaurunga %{product_name} mai i %{old_plan} ki %{new_plan}.
